methodology: Manual review of 100 student-scholarship pairs flagged as matches

root_causes.description: Scholarships with past deadlines shown to students
Students shown scholarships requiring higher GPA than they have
root_causes.fix: Hard filter minGpa parameter when provided

root_causes.description: Students shown scholarships for different majors
root_causes.fix: Fuzzy major matching with NFKD normalization

root_causes.description: Students shown scholarships restricted to other states

false_negative_analysis.mitigation: Fuzzy major matching, deadline buffer of 30 days
